member.name: T:ClimaMundi.Api.Controllers.WeatherController
member.summary: Get the weather for any location

member.name: M:ClimaMundi.Api.Controllers.WeatherController.GetByCoordinates(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Get the weather for a location specified by a coordinate pair

member.name: M:ClimaMundi.Api.Controllers.WeatherController.GetByLocation(System.String)
member.summary: Get the weather for a location by a text search, picks the most relevant location based on the search.

member.name: M:ClimaMundi.Api.Services.GeocodingService.ReverseGeocodeAsync(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets readable location data for a set of coordinates. Selects the most detailed location available.

member.name: M:ClimaMundi.Api.Services.GeocodingService.ForwardGeocodeAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the most relevant location based on a search string.

member.name: T:ClimaMundi.Api.Services.WeatherService
member.summary: Service targeting the DarkSky API. Uses models from the DarkSky Core wrapper, but not the service provided there.
